title: Between jokes, Trump suggests meeting Kim Jong Un
text:
Between jokes, Trump suggests meeting Kim Jong Un 11:59am EST - 01:29 
In the midst of a joke-filled monologue at a dinner with journalists,   suggested on Saturday that the United States will be meeting with North Korea but has told Pyongyang it must first“denuke.”   
In the midst of a joke-filled monologue at a dinner with journalists,   suggested on Saturday that the United States will be meeting with North Korea but has told Pyongyang it must first“denuke.”  //reut.rs/2I48ktF
